_Builder.ValidateSegment (METH)
_Builder.ValidateSegment (METH)
Â¶
METHOD ValidateSegment :
ERROR
This method validates the current segment of the builder
To get a free segment out of the builder, method
GetCurrentSegment
can be called beforehand
Check error return value for better diagnostics
InOut:
Scope

Type
Comment
Return
ValidateSegment

Pointer to the first byte of the segment

The amount of validated bytes in builder
